body:
Well, try restarting the web server :) As you are not specifying which system you are on I'm going to explain 2 situations:

Windows Go to the XAMPP screen and click "Stop" , once stapped hit "start" for the web server entry.

** Linux ** Based on your distro run either of these:

  • sudo service apache2 restart
  • sudo systemctl restart httpd.service

Also, I noticed a \ in your code that shouldn't be there, try removing that.

$mail = new \PHPMailer();

Should look like:

$mail = new PHPMailer();
title: Localhost don't reload php script
